resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Full stack development of a popular cross platform nutrition tracking application built using Java, Dart, SQL, HTML/CSS and technologies such as GWT and Google Flutter, using Git as version control

work.title: Research Assistant - Curriculum Development
work.description: Developed curriculum for the lab component of an upper level cognitive science course, COGS 300 (Understanding and Designing Cognitive Systems), involving various projects using Arduino, see http://blogs.ubc.ca/cogs300

projects.title: OpBuddy
projects.category: React based web application using Microsoft Azure's Computer Vision API intended to help individuals with upcoming surgeries manage their appointments, mnedications and costs.

projects.title: Insight UBC
projects.category: Full stack web application built using Typescript and NodeJS that allows users to query UBC datasets for information about courses and buildings

projects.title: factually.ai
projects.category: Web application built with Flask to demonstrate machine learning model that classifies Facebook comments as anti-vaccination or not

projects.title: ASL Recognizer
